CustomField.description: If the invoice not received was a result of the customer not receiving the invoice via the system generated email, have you confirmed that the right email is being used in the NCR system setup?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the invoice not received was a result of the customer not receiving the invoice via the system generated email, have you confirmed that the right email is being used in the NCR system setup?
CustomField.label: Confirmed correct email in NCR setup?
